sn22.84:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:4.6: thinamiddhañca me cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati;
sn22.84:5.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.84:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.84:5.4: “āyasmā, bhante, tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
sn22.84:6.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena tissaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehī”ti.
sn22.84:6.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā tisso tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.84:6.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā tisso tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.84:6.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ tissaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.84:6.9: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tissa, sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamārocesi:
sn22.84:6.10: ‘api me, āvuso, madhurakajāto viya kāyo … pe …
sn22.84:6.13: “* Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, tissa, rūpe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa, tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:8.3: Yathā taṃ saṅkhāresu anigatarāgassa, viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa, tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:9.4: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, tissa, rūpe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa, tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:10.7: viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:11.4: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, tissa, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.84:12.2: eko puriso amaggakusalo, eko puriso maggakusalo.
sn22.84:12.3: Tamenaṃ so amaggakusalo puriso amuṃ maggakusalaṃ purisaṃ maggaṃ puccheyya.
sn22.84:12.7: Tena muhuttaṃ gantvā dakkhissasi dvedhāpathaṃ, tattha vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāhi.
sn22.84:12.9: Tena muhuttaṃ gantvā dakkhissasi tibbaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ.
sn22.84:12.11: Tena muhuttaṃ gantvā dakkhissasi mahantaṃ ninnaṃ pallalaṃ.
sn22.84:12.13: Tena muhuttaṃ gantvā dakkhissasi sobbhaṃ papātaṃ.
sn22.84:12.15: Tena muhuttaṃ gantvā dakkhissasi samaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ ramaṇīyan’ti.
sn22.84:13.1: Upamā kho myāyaṃ, tissa, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
sn22.84:13.4: ‘Puriso maggakusalo’ti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn22.84:13.6: ‘Vāmo maggo’ti kho, tissa, aṭṭhaṅgikassetaṃ micchāmaggassa adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
sn22.84:13.9: ‘Dakkhiṇo maggo’ti kho, tissa, ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
sn22.84:13.13: ‘Mahantaṃ ninnaṃ pallalan’ti kho, tissa, kāmānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
sn22.84:13.15: ‘Samo bhūmibhāgo ramaṇīyo’ti kho, tissa, nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
sn22.84:13.17: Ahamovādena ahamanuggahena ahamanusāsaniyā”ti.
sn22.84:14.2: Attamano āyasmā tisso bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
